devdoc.details: Interface for the Credential Verifier contract Provides verification functions for credentials

getVerificationCount(address).details: Get verification history count for a verifier

getVerificationStatus(uint256).details: Get verification result as boolean and reason

isCredentialValid(uint256).details: Quick check if credential is valid (simplified version)

verifyCredential(uint256).details: Verify a credential's authenticity and validity

params.tokenId: The ID of the credential to verify

returns._0: VerificationResult struct with detailed verification status

params.tokenIds: Array of credential IDs to verify

verifyCredentialHash(uint256,bytes32).details: Verify credential against a specific hash

returns._0: True if hashes match, false otherwise

verifyCredentialType(uint256,uint8).details: Check if credential type matches expected type

returns._0: True if types match, false otherwise

params.issuerAddress: Address of the issuer to verify

returns._0: True if issuer is accredited, false otherwise

params.claimedHolder: Address claiming to own the credential

returns._0: True if holder owns the credential, false otherwise
True if proof is valid, false otherwise

devdoc.title: IVerifier
